examples.example: 我经常在这个有趣的网站上学习各种有趣的知识。

translate.english: I often learn all kinds of interesting knowledge on this interesting website.

examples.example: 这个网站给人们提供了丰富多样的信息和资源，真是太棒了！

translate.english: This website provides people with rich and diverse information and resources, which is really great!

examples.example: 我在这个内容丰富的网站上找到了很多对我有帮助的资料，真的很开心。

translate.english: I found a lot of helpful materials on this rich-content website and I am really very happy.
